title: Shoppers are going wild for Primark’s £7 Grinch pyjamas
text:

Christmas may still be a few months away, but that doesn't mean its too early to start wearing the festive attire already.

And nothing says Christmas quite like a new pair of cosy pyjamas - especially when they're Grinch themed.

So its hardly surprising that shoppers are going mad for Primark's new Grinch pyjamas, which will set you back just £7 a pair.

Available in multiple sizes so the whole family can be matching, the set features a jumper emblazoned with the Grinch's famous face wearing a Santa hat, and a pair of matching jogging bottoms.

(Image: Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK)

However, Primark aren't the only store to be stocking Grinch pyjamas right now, with New Look also selling a set - with some very cool shorts - for £15.99, whilst a store on eBay is also stocking an array of different Grinch-pyjama designs.

Originally spotted by one excited shopper on Facebook page Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK , the post has attracted over 2,000 likes.

There's also plenty comments from keen shoppers, including some members of the group saying "I need these!!!!!!" whilst a fourth added: "Can we wear these at work for Christmas?".

The pyjamas are already in Primark stores all across the country, there's no word on whether this is a limited piece of stock or if it will be available up until Christmas, so it may be worth ringing up your local branch beforehand.
description: Christmas is coming - and what better way to get ready for it than with a pair of £7 Grinch pyjamas from Primark
